name: Running Taxi
description:
Vim Jam: Collectibles, There and Back.

Drive around, explore the three districts, get collectibles, return to a Garage for repair and refuel.

Most art from Kenney (www.kenney.nl)

Some by me.

Instructions:

Use Arrow Keys, WASD, or Joystick/Gamepad to drive around. B or Button 1 to brake. Escape or Button 9 to end game.

Taxi people to their destinations.
